questions.author: Charlier Guillaume
clues: My capital has a metal structure which is one of my symbols
My motto is "Unity is strength"
My king during the Second World War ordered cessation of fighting by the army at the end of May 1940

questions.author: Charlier Guillaume
clues: It was the place of one of the greatest defeats of Napoleon
Without this country there would be no international space station
It is the largest state in the world

questions.author: Charlier Guillaume
clues: This country is nicknamed "the African miracle", "the exception of the continent" or "the Switzerland of Africa"
Poaching of elephants and rhinos is very present
I am between Namibia and Zimbabwe

questions.author: Trempont Mathieu
clues: The ancients worshiped more than 1,400 different gods and goddesses in my country
The Statue of Liberty was designed for me, but fate decided otherwise
I have the most famous pyramids in the world : Khéops, Khéphren et Mykérinos

questions.author: Trempont Mathieu
clues: I host one of the most famous carnivals in the world
My flag contains 27 stars, one for each states plus one for the federal district where is located my capital
I am the nation that won the Football World Cup the most times (5 times)

questions.author: Trempont Mathieu
clues: My capital is the most populous city in the world
There is almost no delay in my rail network
I am one of the last countries to have an emperor

questions.author: Gailliez Valentin
clues: I'm divided into 58 provinces and five municipalities, which are administratively on the same level as provinces.
In 2017, I signed the UN treaty on the Prohibition of Nuclear Weapons
I'm located on the eastern Indochinese Peninsula

questions.author: Gailliez Valentin
clues: Until the early 19th century, I was best known as "New Holland"
I'm the oldest, flattest, and driest inhabited continent, with the least fertile soils
I'm separated from Asia by the Arafura and Timor seas, with the Coral Sea lying off the Queensland coast

questions.author: Gailliez Valentin
clues: With an estimated 48 million people in 2019, I'm the third-most populous country in Latin America
The country has between 40,000 and 45,000 plant species, equivalent to 10 or 20% of total global species
I'ms bordered to the northwest by Panama, to the east by Venezuela and Brazil, and to the south by Ecuador and Peru

questions.author: Gailliez Valentin
clues: My name is probably from a Portuguese transliteration of the name of the Zenaga also known as the Sanhaja
I will host the 2022 Summer Youth Olympics
I am externally bounded by the Atlantic Ocean to the west, Mauritania to the north, Mali to the east, and Guinea and Guinea-Bissau to the south
